name: European Confederation of Woodworking Industries
goal: The European Confederation of Woodworking Industries represents 23 European and National federations as well as 1 commercial public establishment from 16 countries and is the Organization backing the interests of the whole industrial European wood sector: more than 184.000 companies generating an annual turnover of 130 billion euros and employing 1.1 million workers in the EU.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Industrial policies, environmental policies, social policies, trade policies, climate policies, agricultural policies, energy policies, R&D policies.
